The United States Capitol, often called the Capitol Building, is located on Capitol Hill at the eastern end of the National Mall in Washington, D.C.

The United States Capitol, often called the Capitol Building, is located in Washington, D.C., at the eastern end of the National Mall on a plateau 88 feet above the level of the Potomac River, commanding a westward view across the U.S. Capitol Reflecting Pool to the Washington Monument 1.4 miles away.
